Class UserOptions

java.lang.Object
  UserOptions

public class UserOptions
extends java.lang.Object

This class is responsible for retrieving user settings properties

Author:
Amir Raminfar

Constructor Detail

UserOptions

UserOptions()
Creates a new instance of this class by reading the user option's file. If no user options file exists then it will create a file from default values
